column5: Does anyone know how do you post a video? Just interested in case I ever need to. Thanks,
you sign up with youtube then upload it to youtube then copy the embedded link and paste it in your post and there it is
Dont you have to click on RAW link? I do if I want the vid to show with out going to youtube.
Just post the embeded link youtube provides and when you post it on here expand the post options at the bottom of the page and turn HTML on.. either mode works I belive.

Like if I did this,,,,    You have to click and it takes you there.   If I do this,,,,,,,,,,,, You just click and watch.You need to click the auto linebreak mode.  I think this is Pete Bowmans twin.LOL   <object style="height: 390px; width: 640px"><param name="movie" value="http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fdpAAFFpURk?version=3"><param'>http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fdpAAFFpURk?version=3"><param name="allowFullScreen" value="true"><param name="allowScriptAccess" value="always"><embed src="http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fdpAAFFpURk?version=3" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" allowfullscreen="true" allowScriptAccess="always" width="640" height="390"></object>
